detail_desc: Short dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves that have covered elastication at the hems. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust and a flared skirt with a tier. Unlined.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.

Blouse in a softly draping jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Frilled stand-up collar and long puff sleeves with frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs. Concealed button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for high comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Long-sleeved top in imitation suede with low dropped shoulders, slightly wider sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a yoke and short sleeves in stretch lace.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Long shirt in an airy chiffon weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric hem with slits in the sides.
Soft jersey jumpsuit made from a marled viscose blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves, an elasticated seam and at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Short dress in airy chiffon containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Underdress in jersey with a sheen.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, wide top in a printed weave with ribbing around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Wide sweatshirt in soft velour with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with elastication and decorative embroidery at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long metal earrings that can be worn by those without pierced ears.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and a frill at the sides.
Leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a painted metal buckle. Moulded nappa leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shirt in sturdy, checked cotton flannel with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric and a narrow collar. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sequins and plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, covered block heels and narrow straps that cross over the foot and wind around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Heel 2.5 cm.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap, metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 11 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.

Calf-length dress in a gently crêped weave with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck and a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and ties at one side. Seam at the waist and a skirt with an asymmetric, flounced hem.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length kaftan dress in cool viscose jersey. Relaxed fit with a V-neck and short sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sleeveless body in sturdy jersey with lace sections at the front and a V-neck front and back. Seam at the hips and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short, butterfly sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, and a flounce around the neckline.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short cardigan in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and tie-front fastening.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere. Short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slim-fit, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frills over the shoulders and long sleeves. Buttons at the back, cable-knit sections down the sleeves and at the front, and a flared skirt.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Flounced seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric hem. Half lined.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a heart-shaped chest pocket, and side and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Jersey-lined legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Shaping briefs in jersey with an extra-high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the tummy.
Slingbacks in imitation suede and soft, transparent plastic with pointed toes, covered block heels and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a wide foldover at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a small stand-up collar with decorative lace flowers and narrow ties. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with lace flowers.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim fit.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
3/4-length microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication at the hems.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
High-waisted bikini bottoms in wide mesh with fully lined inner bikini bottoms.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Unlined.
Fitted, gathered top in jersey with a V-neck, vertical seams down the front and back and long sleeves.
Short T-shirt in soft viscose with a print motif on the front and tie detail at the hem.
Non-wired bra in lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a wider neckline, print motif, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, wide flounce at the top and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Oversized zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a button placket.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, pair of trousers and a hairband in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elastication around the heels. Hairband with a large bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.

Jacket in sturdy cotton twill with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front, a zipped chest pocket and two side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
